posts.content:
Unfortunately due to moving to Canada and a lack of space due to another project running over, it's time to sell my 58' single cab pick up

Registered in UK with all duties paid with supporting paperwork, V5c and have fitted new number plates.
I have every piece of paper work for this van including duties all paid, V5, Tax etc so there is nothing to be done with that when purchased.
Best thing is as pre 1960 van is both TAX AND MOT EXEMPT and is already registered for both.
Over £4000 has been spent having the engine, gear box and brakes rebuilt.
I have added a couple of videos links below taken just after the works were completed.
Always dry stored when in the UK.
Below is list of all works completed this year 2016:

IMG_7659.jpg


Brakes:
-New Wheel Cylinders all round
-New front shoes
-New Master Cylinder
-New 4 Flexible hoses

Engine:
-Turns on the button every time with new ignition barrel and key just fitted.
-Recon 1600 engine New Barrels and Pistons
-Recon Heads Completely rebuilt by Beetlemania in North London with over 40 years experience
-New Fly wheel
-New exhaust
-Dynamo & Regulator
-New Clutch
-New starter motor
-New coil and HT leads
-Gear box runs through all gears

IMG_0024.jpg


-New 12v battery

One windscreen cracked so will need replacing.
Drop sides are solid as are the doors and front.
Most electrics are working. Lights are on but indicator need wiring in, but again everything is there ready.
There are areas of welding needed but this can be done as you go.
Tyres good but has snow tyres on the front so not sure if legal for UK roads.

Needs one replacement windscreen available at VW Heritage for £59.
Petrol tank has a small leak after about 2 gallons has been put in but have found one on eBay for £119 item No: 371434722916 (So is a relatively cheap and simple fix) and they are also sold at JustKampers.

Priced for a quick sale and open to offers.
£11000
Located in Kent, England.

Screen Shot 2015-09-18 at 22.03.00.png

Screen Shot 2015-09-18 at 22.02.53.png


As you can see from videos van drives and is fully running and as pre 1960 doesn't need an MOT so in theory you could just drive away.
